description: Vernan Kee designs shows off his art and his love of getting outside in this limited edition designed graphic tee. Feel the benefits of Merino wool, like temperature regulation and sweat and odor control, combined with the durability and quick dry time of recycled polyester. Whether you’re chasing mountains yourself, or planning to in the near future, this tee is ready for the trek.
name: Smartwool Chasing Mountains Graphic SS Tee - Unisex

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 44% Recycled Polyester - Exclusive of Decoration
